snippet: The TimesTalks series is hosting a panel discussion on Wednesday with current and former Olympians, including Teresa Edwards (basketball), Kim Rhode (shooting), Mariel Zagunis (fencing), Ester Lofgren (rowing) and Natalie Coughlin (swimming), about...
abstract: The TimesTalks series is hosting a panel discussion on Wednesday with current and former Olympians, including Teresa Edwards (basketball), Kim Rhode (shooting), Mariel Zagunis (fencing), Ester Lofgren (rowing) and Natalie Coughlin (swimming), about how women's participation in the Games has changed and about their personal experiences. Moderated by Juliet Macur of The Times and streamed live now.

headline.main: TimesTalks: Women of the Summer Games
